title: Kindred next week? Really?
body: What other changes even need to be made?

replies.body: Least it hasn't been like it was with Diana for ages where they release a Champ and then disable them 5 days later for 2 weeks until they can work out why she just triple kills in 0.3 seconds and walks away full HP.
You mean she doesn't anymore? well you coulda fooled me...

She gets big power spikes earlyish now and there are a lot of melees happening in games so she crept back up to 70% power level plus attack speed is more cost effective now 2.

{{item:1056}} {{item:1076}} {{item:1314}} {{item:3041}} < That was legit my fave build and all you needed was 2 kills and it was GG she'd spike out of control with her huge ratios and base dmg. Her base dmg was the problem and that got cut and then they nerfed her ratios a while later and then again a bit later after that, whilst buffing her shield a bit to compensate.

They nerfed basically every part or aspect of her kit.

Ok, MY problem with Diana is her capability to never lose a 1v1 scenario, she has decent AOE, good poke, incredible all in, good AOE CC and gets respectably tanky. Sure she has to go IN and that's one of her weaknesses, but who cares about how far you've dived when no one is left alive to take advantage of it?
Remember Azir? supposed to be released near the beginning of the ascension event, but was released with only 1 day to go on his own event. shit happens.
